nodes.text: Saesee Tiin's lightsaber was the personal green-bladed lightsaber of the Iktotchi Jedi Master Saesee Tiin. It used a common lightsaber handle design shared by several of his fellow Jedi, including Ki-Adi-Mundi and Aayla Secura. It was not as worn as other Jedi's weapons due to his preference for starfighter combat over lightsaber combat.
